item.title: ‘I do all the yard work, cooking and cleaning’: I live with my daughter and her lazy boyfriend. She wants me to buy her house. Do I say yes?
item.description: “When I say anything, I am immediately wrong, unless my daughter wants something.”

item.title: Indian regulator locks U.S. trading firm out of its stock market, accusing it of ‘index manipulation’ and ‘unlawful gains’
item.description: Financial penalty and trading ban come at a difficult time in relations between U.S. and India

item.title: S&P 500 futures and dollar dip as Trump revives tariff tension
‘I’m single’: At 70, I have $500,000 in stocks and $220,000 in savings. How do I invest my $130,000 windfall?
item.description: “I’m receiving enough Social Security to live on.”

item.title: ‘My whole financial world is upside down’: I’m ‘medically retired’ at 51 with $428K in stocks. Is this enough to live on?
item.description: “We don’t know where we will retire. It could be South Carolina, Georgia, Alabama, Mississippi or Texas.”
